评论详情: He asked for these for his birthday and he loves them and where’s them all the time

These are really nice parachute pants that have a bit of weight to them and seem very well made.  They are trimmed nicely such as the stripes on the side, the large draw string, the hemming, and the overall stitching.  I ordered these for me, even though they are men's as it's hard to find women's parachute pants.  I wear between a L and XL, and ordered an L.  The pants fit!! They aren't as loose as I would want, so I would have been best with an XL but that does say that the sizing is universal.  Very very pleased with these.
